call sp_broadcast_room_guest_invite(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT a.mem_no , a.room_no , b.image_profile , c.mem_sex , c.mem_nick , d.auth FROM tb_broadcast_room_guest a INNER JOIN tb_member_profile b ON a.mem_no = b.mem_no INNER JOIN tb_member_basic c ON a.mem_no = c.mem_no INNER JOIN tb_broadcast_room_member d ON a.mem_no = d.mem_no AND a.room_no = d.room_no AND a.state = 1 AND a.room_no = #{roomNo}

SELECT a.room_no , b.mem_no , c.mem_nick , c.mem_sex , d.image_profile FROM tb_broadcast_room_live_list a INNER JOIN tb_broadcast_room_member b on a.room_no = b.room_no INNER JOIN tb_member_basic c ON b.mem_no = c.mem_no INNER JOIN tb_member_profile d ON b.mem_no = d.mem_no WHERE a.state <> 4 AND b.state = 0 AND b.auth = 2 AND b.guest_propose = 0 AND a.room_no = ${roomNo} AND b.mem_no = ${memNo}
SELECT room_no , mem_no , guest_propose , guest_yn FROM tb_broadcast_room_member WHERE room_no = #{room_no} AND mem_no = #{mem_no} AND state = 0
